channel.title: DoleScape needs help
channel.description:
well i made my server have max of 20 players becuz i lag at 25 but, Some localhost ip keeps coming in, but its now, takign up the room, when it hits 20 i freeze, then lagg out, here is my server console when it logs in
Starting DoleScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2731 Client type: high memory version UserId: 94292925 dolerock has signed onto server. ClientHandler: Accepted from adsl-065-012-248-067.sip.mia.bellsouth.net:50223 Client type: high memory version UserId: 20616137 99 str ownz has signed onto server. ClientHandler: Accepted from custom-webhost.com:38978 ClientHandler: Accepted from custom-webhost.com:38989 ClientHandler: Accepted from custom-webhost.com:38993 ClientHandler: Accepted from custom-webhost.com:39058 ClientHandler: Accepted from custom-webhost.com:39098 ClientHandler: Accepted from custom-webhost.com:39104 ClientHandler: Accepted from custom-webhost.com:39111 ClientHandler: Accepted from custom-webhost.com:39133 ClientHandler: Accepted from custom-webhost.com:39177 ClientHandler: Accepted from custom-webhost.com:39244 ClientHandler: Accepted from custom-webhost.com:39259 ClientHandler: Accepted from custom-webhost.com:39319
what is cosing this problem and why?
